machine_extruder_start_code.default_value:
;start T1

M117 changing tool....
M109 T1 S{material_print_temperature}

G1 Y-47 F9000; wipe
G1 X150 Y10 F9000

M117 printing...

machine_extruder_end_code.default_value:
M104 T1 S{material_standby_temperature}
G1 X150 Y10 F9000
G1 X-47 Y47 F9000 ; go to wipe position
G1 X0 Y-100 F3000; wipe
G1 X-44 F9000
;end T1
